column3: User is able to register a new account.
column8: Verify registration success message is displayed.

column3: User is able to login with a valid email and password pair.
column8: Verify dashboard or homepage is loaded.

column3: User is able to restore a password.
column9: Check email for password reset link
column13: Verify password has been updated and user can login with new password.

column3: Negative: User is unable to register with an existing email.
Negative: User is unable to login with incorrect email and password.
Negative: User is unable to restore password with incorrect email.
column7: Click on "Send password reset link" button

column3: Usability: User experience during registration process is smooth and intuitive.
column7: Verify all form fields are clearly labeled
column8: Verify inputs are easy to use
column10: Verify registration process is visually appealing and error-free.

column3: Compatibility: System is able to register and login with various email domains.
column8: Verify user is able to login with these emails
column9: Verify password reset works for these emails.
